title: [My Champion Version] Omen, The Dream Eater (stealth tank/assassin)
body:
_Where did he came from?_
He is from dream realm. He is born out of dreams of traitors, thieves and liars. He managed to to escape the world of dreams and enter Runeterra through the final dream of dying magician.

_Who he is?_
He is dream being. However, because he left dream realm he can't go back to where he came from. His origin is similar to Nocturne's, so you could say that they are relatives.

_What do he want?_
Runetarra is nothing like the dream realm. This new world offers him so much, yet he still misses some of his kind he left in dream realm, so he wishes to open the gate between two world for all dream beings to invade Runeterra.

_Is he evil?_
Not exactly. He is dream being, so he is without morality or common sense. All he does is normal and perfectly fine to him. He doesn't know the difference between good and evil, so he is neither. 

_Why did he became a champion?_
He wants to learn how Nocturne entered Runeterra and do the same for other dream beings.
